summary: I didn't like how some characters looked so i changed them to my liking :)
descriptionHtml:
I changed just some single characters i didn't like because i thougt they looked boring or just straight up ugly in my eyes. I am really new to this so it's just basic changes like hairstyles, starting armor and som faceshapes. The effected girls are Lydia, Uthgerd, Hroki and Jordis. This is my first mod i've ever done so hopefully it will work out fine.

(Installation:)
Just drag and drop the esp in your DATA folder and check it in the launcher or thirdparty program.

(Requirements:)
Update 11, Dawnguard (Serana small changes).

(Other:)
I used CBBEv3:s bodies and faces from Caliente when creating this mod so thanks to her for making this great mod! I could use some help with the basics when it comes to making mods so if you have a tutorial to link to me i would appreciate it :)
author: massimow
